author: Nick Koumbarakis
description: “The Tourist is a drink dedicated to the bartenders of today, drawing inspiration from several elements. Firstly, fresh roasted El Salvador coffee beans evoke an aroma, a memory of my father drinking strong black coffee whilst reading the local paper, strong in character, of family value and integrity - likened to that of founder Don Facundo BACARDÍ Masso. Sweet vermouth, amaretto, cardamom and saffron, ingredients that spark adventure and uncertainty and the hope of something more, something brave - BACARDÍ Carta Blanca brings these complex ingredients together.”
name: The Tourist

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cardamom pods in base of mixing glass
Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into an espresso cup
